BTC 2020

```{r}
Ticker_code <- "btc-usd"
Aktie_navn <- "Bitcoin"
valuta_for_aktie <- "USD"
date_from <- "2020-01-01"

gsadf_u <- GSADF(ticker = Ticker_code,
                 min_window = 60,
                 step_length = 1,
                 window_increase = 1,
                 date_from = date_from,
                 date_to = "2020-12-01",
                 drift = F,
                 trend = F,
                 risk_free_rate = 0.01)


plot_GSADF(u = gsadf_u,
           d = NULL,
           d_t = NULL, 
           p_restrict = 0.95, 
           start_date_tq_get = date_from,
           image_name = NULL, 
           valuta = valuta_for_aktie,
           aktie = Aktie_navn)



```
